definitions.definition: An act of irreverence or contempt toward a god or toward something considered sacred ; an impious act, utterance, view, etc.
examples: That imam said that drawing the prophet Muhammad was a form of blasphemy .

definitions.definition: An act of irreverence towards anything considered inviolable ; the act of disregarding a convention .

main_definition: An act of irreverence or contempt toward a god or toward something considered sacred ; an impious act, utterance, view, etc.
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) An act of irreverence towards anything considered inviolable ; the act of disregarding a convention .
